title: ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH - ONLY WHERE AUTHORIZED
content:
ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH - ONLY WHERE AUTHORIZED
State Regulations
§ 40-2.60 - Authorized radioactive materials licensing and inspection program; performance standards
§ 40-2.61 - Authorized radiation-producing equipment inspection program; performance standards
§ 40-2.62 - Authorized tanning facilities licensing and inspection program; performance standards

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
